Locale.Value:
1. New Feature: Users can turn off the auto-routing mode for a connector, so that the connector won't reroute when it's relocated or zoomed in/out.
2. New Feature: Support bulk configuration of page sizes for a multi-page document all at once.
3. New Feature: The image inserted in a note can be zoomed in and out.
4. New Feature: Users can set the shortcuts for switching file tabs and file pages.
5. The minimum zoom-in value has been adjusted from 5% to 1% in order to be compatible with large CAD files.
6. Add the ability to edit X-axis information for Echarts.
7. Improved the compatibility with .vsd files.
8. Improved other features and fixed some bugs.
